title: Status Mobile Not Workingâ—
body:
Something is wrong with Status mobile app today. Not sure if it is just on `develop` (or is it just me? not sure).

Suddenly all the data on the account I was using is gone, then I tried to reinstall the app and create new account, but the app crashes at new account creation (with error `Login failed: LISTEN UDP 0.0.0.0:9000: BIND: ADDRESS ALREADY IN USER`).

I am facing this issue on both iOS and Android.

So after restarting my machine it is back working. But status desktop is not working now with error `Login failed: LISTEN UDP 0.0.0.0:9000: BIND: ADDRESS ALREADY IN USER`. Initially when status-mobile was not working I had that same error and status desktop was running. So now I am not able to run both at the same time for some reason..
So actually status-mobile is still not working on latest develop. Not able to create new account or receive any messages.

No data is being displayed in the app

![Simulator_Screen_Shot_-_iPhone_14_-_2022-12-21_at_12 23 29](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29354102/208840600-40a225c9-6f0a-4360-80e3-5a158766849b.png)
![Simulator_Screen_Shot_-_iPhone_14_-_2022-12-21_at_12 23 33](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29354102/208840611-ec3dfda2-5941-4372-8fc8-c9d24d2edc60.png)

For me also status-mobile ( not latest develop ) but this branch -> https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/tree/14588-add-message-delivery-states does not work with status-desktop v0.8.0 that we are currently dogfooding. This seems to be a dogfooding blocker. However, status-mobile works alone when I terminate status-desktop process @iurimatias
However! When I terminate the mobile simulator and close down all my terminals ( clojure and metro ) I am able to log into status-desktop..

So the issue is that status-mobile and status-desktop are conflicting somewhere when we run them on the same machine @cammellos @OmarBasem 

One more thing to note is that I started noticing this issue yesterday after switching fleet from "eth.prod" to "status.prod"

According to @smohamedjavid that's the latest commit that does not have the issue
![Screenshot_2022-12-21_at_12 42 25_PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29354102/208844870-1537333c-6616-46b0-93b6-c28093895082.png)

> So the issue is that status-mobile and status-desktop are conflicting somewhere when we run them on the same machine @cammellos @OmarBasem
> 
> One more thing to note is that I started noticing this issue yesterday after switching fleet from "eth.prod" to "status.prod"

For me, even when desktop is closed no data is displayed, everything is empty like the above screenshots

> According to @smohamedjavid that's the latest commit that does not have the issue ![Screenshot_2022-12-21_at_12 42 25_PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29354102/208844870-1537333c-6616-46b0-93b6-c28093895082.png)

@yqrashawn : does status-desktop and status-mobile work for you together?
no, they don't work together, must quit status-desktop @siddarthkay
i have similar issue on ios simulator in latest develop, not desktop running, i think we might have two different issues in the same time

`[Wed Dec 21 2022 15:44:30.994]  ERROR    ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:36] - Merging fx with common-key:  :status-im2.common.json-rpc.events/call [{:method "wakuext_unreadActivityCenterNotificationsCount", :params [], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}] [{:method "wakuext_activityCenterNotificationsBy", :params ["" 20 5 2], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}]`

got an error on relogin, desktop is closed

```
[Wed Dec 21 2022 08:45:11.449]  ERROR    ERROR [status-im.chat.models.loading:58] - failed loading messages test {:code -32000, :message "sql: Scan error on column index 18, name \"album_id\": converting NULL to string is unsupported"}
```

whats that ?

> ``` > [Wed Dec 21 2022 08:45:11.449] ERROR ERROR [status-im.chat.models.loading:58] - failed loading messages test {:code -32000, :message "sql: Scan error on column index 18, name \"album_id\": converting NULL to string is unsupported"} > ``` > > whats that ? I saw this error yesterday as well right after I sent messages to @cammellos on simulator when my fleet was eth.prod and after I switched to status.prod I saw this error in logs.. However new chats with users worked fine, this issue would always come when I would open @cammellos's chat Chat with another user (myself on actual device) works fine,( ignore the colors, i'm working on somethin )

> `[Wed Dec 21 2022 15:44:30.994] ERROR ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:36] - Merging fx with common-key: :status-im2.common.json-rpc.events/call [{:method "wakuext_unreadActivityCenterNotificationsCount", :params [], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}] [{:method "wakuext_activityCenterNotificationsBy", :params ["" 20 5 2], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}]`
> 
> got an error on relogin, desktop is closed

did we move json-rpc ?

> > `[Wed Dec 21 2022 15:44:30.994] ERROR ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:36] - Merging fx with common-key: :status-im2.common.json-rpc.events/call [{:method "wakuext_unreadActivityCenterNotificationsCount", :params [], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}] [{:method "wakuext_activityCenterNotificationsBy", :params ["" 20 5 2], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}]`
> > got an error on relogin, desktop is closed
> 
> did we move json-rpc ?

yes, moved to `status-im2.common.json-rpc.events` maybe should add this to `mergeable-keys`? or revert it?

> `[Wed Dec 21 2022 15:44:30.994] ERROR ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:36] - Merging fx with common-key: :status-im2.common.json-rpc.events/call [{:method "wakuext_unreadActivityCenterNotificationsCount", :params [], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}] [{:method "wakuext_activityCenterNotificationsBy", :params ["" 20 5 2], :on-success #object[Function], :on-error #object[Function]}]` > > got an error on relogin, desktop is closed fixed with this will it cause any other issue? there are two json-rpc/call @flexsurfer
created a pr https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/14594 @flexsurfer
still conflict with status-desktop
yeah as i said we have more than one issue, desktop is different one, most likely related to status-go

so we have 3 issues
1) minor 
```
ERROR ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:36] - Merging fx with common-key: :status-im2.common.json-rpc.events/call [{:method "wakuext_unreadActivityCenterNotificationsCount", 
```
2) major
```
[Wed Dec 21 2022 08:45:11.449] ERROR ERROR [status-im.chat.models.loading:58] - failed loading messages test {:code -32000, :message "sql: Scan error on column index 18, name "album_id": converting NULL to string is unsupported"}
```
3) major
`The issue about status-desktop and mobile, is that both try to bind UDP port 9000`

> 3. major
>    `The issue about status-desktop and mobile, is that both try to bind UDP port 9000`

For this, if we merge https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/14575

you should be able to change `UDPPort` to something that does not clash, for the time being, while we make the port dynamic on status-go

1 .  https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/14594
2.  we need to bump status-go and update in mobile develop
1. should be fixed now in latest develop, app is not empty anymore
@cammellos should we change it to 9001 on `develop` for the time being? I mean in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/14575 ?

> @cammellos should we change it to 9001 on `develop` for the time being? I mean in #14575 ?

I think we should let the devs do that, since it's not really a fix, we still have the same issue, and people might be running multiple emulators etc
2. https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/14596
2. should be fixed in the latest develop, empty chats are fixed
